title: C Programming for Microcontrollers
description:
Do you want a low cost way to learn C programming for microcontrollers? This book shows you how to use AtmelÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s $19.99 AVR Butterfly board and the FREE WinAVR C compiler to make a very inexpensive system for using C to develop microcontroller projects.

Students will find the thorough coverage of C explained in the context of microcontrollers to be an invaluable learning aide. Professionals, even those who already know C, will find many useful tested software and hardware examples that will speed their development work.
